variable: long term care expense per day

stochastic_function: lambda age, gender, maximum_coverage_per_day: {2669.68: 1} if age == 65 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 100 else {3981.47: 1} if age == 65 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 150 else {5339.36: 1} if age == 65 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 200 else {6674.20: 1} if age == 65 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 250 else {3764.89: 1} if age == 75 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 100 else {5647.33: 1} if age == 75 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 150 else {7529.77: 1} if age == 75 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 200 else {9412.22: 1} if age == 75 and gender == 'male' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 250 else {2959.19: 1} if age == 65 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 100 else {4438.79: 1} if age == 65 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 150 else {5918.38: 1} if age == 65 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 200 else {7397.98: 1} if age == 65 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 250 else {4959.45: 1} if age == 75 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 100 else {7439.18: 1} if age == 75 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 150 else {9918.90: 1} if age == 75 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 200 else {12398.63: 1} if age == 75 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 250 else {0: 1} if maximum_coverage_per_day == 0 else {}

evidence: long term care expense per day
